title: Eye-Tracking-Based Educational Science Professional Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Studies Concepts and Foundational Professional Knowledge
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented environment for developing beginner-level expertise in medical, legal, or technical fields, with optional smartphone-based eye-tracking tools.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the visual attention distribution during professional task performance with 80% accuracy by analyzing eye-tracking data.
Learners can observe eye-movement patterns in multimedia educational materials to design effective learning strategies.
Learners can suggest at least three methods to enhance visual expertise in professional fields using eye-tracking modeling examples.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
